name: NICA
description:
The game's unfinished for now - I still want to add:

  • sfx and music
  • better enemy AI (would be nice if they could shoot or something)
  • more mechanics (collecting enemy cores)
  • better player controls
  • maybe more enemy types, who knows
  • a nicer background?
  • a better loading screen?
  • more?
Synopsis

It is year 2208, a decade after the Great AI Uprising.

In a last effort to contain the robot upheaval, humans create NICA (Nigh-Indestructible Combat Android). Dropped in the middle of the warzone, the only way for NICA to survive is to destroy other machines, collect and absorb their energy cores.

Controls

Use arrow keys to move, Z to shoot.
